original_text: All the nations shall serve him and his son and his grandson, until the time of his own land comes. Then many nations and great kings shall make him their slave.
korean_text: 모든 나라가 그와 그의 아들과 손자를 그 땅의 기한이 이르기까지 섬기리라 또한 많은 나라들과 큰 왕들이 그 자신을 섬기리라

sentences.original_text: All the nations shall serve him
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 민족이 그를 섬기게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: and his son and his grandson
until the time of his own land comes
sentences.korean_translation: 그 자기 땅의 때가 올 때까지

sentences.original_text: Then many nations and great kings
